meanings.definition: A person who solves Rubik's cubes as a hobby.
meanings.sent1: The cubers at the competition were very skilled.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy watching cubers solve puzzles quickly.
meanings.sent3: The cubers had a race to see who could finish first.
meanings.sent4: She moved the colors like a cubers' expert hands.
meanings.sent5: The cubers' dedication to practice paid off in the tournament.

meanings.definition: A group of people who solve Rubik's cubes competitively.
meanings.sent1: The cubers' team won the championship last year.
meanings.sent2: Many cubers gathered to compete in the event.
meanings.sent3: The cubers celebrated their victory with a party.
meanings.sent4: Their teamwork was as smooth as cubers' solving skills.
meanings.sent5: The cubers' camaraderie made the competition more enjoyable.

meanings.definition: The act of solving Rubik's cubes.
meanings.sent1: His cubers' speed was impressive as he solved the puzzle.
meanings.sent2: The cubers' technique varied from person to person.
meanings.sent3: The cubers' challenge was to solve the cube blindfolded.
meanings.sent4: The cubers' precision in solving amazed the audience.
meanings.sent5: The cubers' determination to solve quickly was evident in their focus.
